synopsis.text: One engineer's world turns upside down when a man-made marvel, the Ocean Techno Polis, is suddenly obliterated by an unknown force, dragging his family into the depths of the sea. Set in a future marked by escalating tensions between Japan and China, this anime follows Kurase as he navigates through a web of secrets guarded by the Japanese navy. In a race against time, Kurase must unravel the mystery behind the sinking of the once-proud floating city and save his loved ones. Based on Katsufumi Umehara's 1995 novel, this thrilling anime will keep you on the edge of your seat.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
